name: Geodude
flavorText:
Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

previous.name: Tentacruel
previous.flavorText:
The tentacles are
normally kept
short. On hunts, they are extended
to ensnare and
immobilize prey.

next.name: Graveler
next.flavorText:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

pokemon.name: Geodude

Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.flavorText:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.flavorText:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.
